item.title: Secure private Docker registry on DC/OS
item.description: This is a short guide on how to set up a private docker registry behind an internal marathon-lb instance all running on DC/OS. Since marathon-lb is a Layer 7 load balancer we will use it to terminate SSL for our private registry and avoid using it in insecure mode. We will use self-signed TLS certificates for that purpose.
